title: 03/31/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/31/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Rick Stroud about Bruce Arians sudden retirement. Why now and why Todd Bowles? Contrary to what we thought, Charles Barkley tells us we can only do one day of the show at his house for Super Bowl week. And Brandell Chamblee checks in to discuss Tiger Woods playing at the Masters.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Rick Stroud about Bruce Arians sudden retirement. Why now and why Todd Bowles? Contrary to what we thought, Charles Barkley tells us we can only do one day of the show at his house for Super Bowl week. And Brandell Chamblee checks in to discuss Tiger Woods playing at the Masters.
